name: Line: The First 1D Game
description:
This is a simple 1D game made for LowRezJam2022. It contains two modes (Defend and Attack) and five difficulties.

How to play - Defend

This is really simple. You're standing in one place and shooting enemies that are coming closer. Shoot with Space, Alt, E, Enter or left-click.

How to play - Attack

This is a bit more complicated. You're moving and the enemies are standing. You're shooting them and they're trying to shoot you. If your bullet and an enemy's bullet collide, both of them are destroyed. Move with AD or arrows, shoot with the same controls as in Defend.
